definitions.definition: Someone or something that is frivolous or impulsive .
Synonym of gid ( “ a disease caused by parasitic infestation of the brain by tapeworm larvae ” ) .

main_definition: Someone or something that is frivolous or impulsive .
secondary_definitions: ( British , agriculture , veterinary medicine ) Synonym of gid ( “ a disease caused by parasitic infestation of the brain by tapeworm larvae ” ) .
